Lyrics: Qui dort icy? Le faut-il demander?
Poetic Translation: Who's sleeping here? Don't ask about that bed!

Lyrics: Venus y dort qui vous peut commander;
Poetic Translation: Venus sleeps there; by her all hearts are led.

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: Who wakens her sets trouble in motion!
If she awakes, she surely will open

Lyrics: Ses deux beaux yeux pour les vostres bander.
Poetic Translation: Her lovely eyes and blindfold you instead.
